subject: URGENT: Finalize Q2 Report
body: Hi team, please finalize the Q2 financial report ASAP. The deadline is tomorrow EOD. This is critical.

subject: Action Required: Follow up on Ticket #12345
body: Please review the latest update on support ticket #12345 and provide feedback to the client by Wednesday.

subject: FYI: New Marketing Campaign Launch
body: Just letting everyone know that the new campaign website goes live next Monday. No action needed from your side.

subject: Quick question about Project Alpha
body: Hey, can we chat briefly about the Project Alpha debrief scheduled for today? Just want to align on key points.

subject: Important: Submit timesheets
body: Reminder to submit your weekly timesheets by Friday 5 PM.
